channel.title: Social Engineering - Some useful links & tools
channel.description:
#SOCIAL ENGINEERING - USEFUL LINKS#
_**Below is a small list containing some links to help you perform an SE Attack as well as some addiotional information**_
**ADDITIONAL INFORMATION**
http://www.social-engineer.org/ - A free learning resource to Social Engineers, made by Social Engineers http://www.social-engineer.org/framework/general-discussion/ - More information on Social Engineering https://www.cybrary.it/ - A free learning platform for everything CyberSec https://www.cybrary.it/course/social-engineering/ - Link to the SE Course on Cybrary.it
**TOOLS**
http://www.social-engineer.org/framework/se-tools/ - A list of tools and capabilities necessary to the Social Engineer http://www.asterisk.org/ - VoIP Software (Allows Caller ID Spoofing after some configuration) http://social-engineer.org/wiki/archives/CallerIDspoofing/CallerID-SpoofingWithAsterisk.html - Tutorial on how to use Asterisk http://www.paterva.com/web7/ - Maltego http://www.social-engineer.org/framework/se-tools/computer-based/maltego/ - Overview of Maltego by SE point of view http://www.yasni.com/ - People Search Engine http://www.whitepages.com/name/Anywho-Anywhere - Another People Search Engine
If you have any other links that you think might contribute to the list, post them in the comments.

item.title: Social Engineering - Some useful links & tools
item.dc:creator: n3xUs
item.description:
#SOCIAL ENGINEERING - USEFUL LINKS#

Below is a small list containing some links to help you perform an SE Attack as well as some addiotional information

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

http://www.social-engineer.org/ - A free learning resource to Social Engineers, made by Social Engineers
http://www.social-engineer.org/framework/general-discussion/ - More information on Social Engineering
https://www.cybrary.it/ - A free learning platform for everything CyberSec
https://www.cybrary.it/course/social-engineering/ - Link to the SE Course on Cybrary.it

TOOLS

http://www.social-engineer.org/framework/se-tools/ - A list of tools and capabilities necessary to the Social Engineer
http://www.asterisk.org/ - VoIP Software (Allows Caller ID Spoofing after some configuration)
http://social-engineer.org/wiki/archives/CallerIDspoofing/CallerID-SpoofingWithAsterisk.html - Tutorial on how to use Asterisk
http://www.paterva.com/web7/ - Maltego
http://www.social-engineer.org/framework/se-tools/computer-based/maltego/ - Overview of Maltego by SE point of view
http://www.yasni.com/ - People Search Engine
http://www.whitepages.com/name/Anywho-Anywhere - Another People Search Engine

If you have any other links that you think might contribute to the list, post them in the comments.
